Question
========

One pure coin is thrown up four times and there are several possible outcomes. *A* is the event: 2 times heads and 2 times tails (in any order). What then is the probability of *A*?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2
* 1/4
* 1/8
* 3/8

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2: Incorrect
* 1/4: Incorrect
* 1/8: Incorrect
* 3/8: Correct
